Issue.creator: rennman
Issue.description: Some performance issues surfaced during the course of benchmark testing. The original scripts never accounted for a number of servers greater than 10. In particular, one verification function fails if the number of servers is > 10. In addition there were numerous polling timers which bore optimization. Lastly, some hard-coded sleeps, which were necessary during the nascent development stage are no longer needed. Consequently, the runtime for the fvt tests is reduced by up to 40%
